sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.getFeatureAccessEnabledStatus</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Get whether we toggle the Feature Access Enabled checkbox</description>
        <name>getFeatureAccessEnabledStatus</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var getFeatureAccessEnabledStatus = Class.create();
getFeatureAccessEnabledStatus.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getCheckboxStatus: function () {
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_hub_resource_filter_rule");
		// DEF0310491 - ensure we make sure user can access table before querying
		if(gr.canRead()){
			var allUISectionsActive = true;
			gr.addQuery("resource.name", "All UI Elements");
			gr.query();
			while(gr.next()) {
				if (gr.getValue("active") == 0) {
					allUISectionsActive	= false;
					return allUISectionsActive;
				}
			}
		}
		
	},
    type: 'getFeatureAccessEnabledStatus'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-08-14 22:57:52</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7da3148f732210104f274e3a4cf6a72e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>getFeatureAccessEnabledStatus</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Flow Designer Content Filtering" source="com.glide.hub.content_filtering">3a14cd4b6da620100acb70b35343308d</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7da3148f732210104f274e3a4cf6a72e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-07-12 12:57:52</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>626</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
